structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY CLASSIFICATION, BOUNDARIES, AND ALTERNATIVE METHOD OF CONSOLIDATING GOVERNMENTAL SERVICES

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 303, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1980. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3666.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Liability of property owners in territory annexed to sixth-class city for debts of city incurred before annexation.
